title: Activision Blizzard Sued Over ‘Frat Boy’ Culture - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.22.21
description:
It is another Tim Tam Thursday! Join Tim and Tamoor as they breakdown all the announcements fro EA Play and go over the absolutely heartbreaking Activision Blizzard lawsuit. Follow Tam at https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:10 - Everything Announced At EA Play Live 2021
00:37:00 -  Ad
00:40:35 - Activision Blizzard Sued Over ‘Frat Boy’ Culture, Harassment  (Maeve Allsup at Bloomberg)
00:57:08 - Blizzard Botched Warcraft III Remake After Internal Fights, Pressure Over Costs (Bloomberg’s Jason Schreier)
01:01:00 - Banks, brokerages, PSN, the Steam Store and more are down in massive internet outage (Mitchell Clark at The Verge)
01:03:43 - PS5 Users get 6 Months of Apple TV + free (PlayStation Blog)
01:06:00 - Out today
01:09:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
